Edited June 23, 2023 by Anth12
I think this has been the case since launch; I have a 5120x1440 display and that's never been an option. I've had to rely on hacking the settings.json to be able to use it.

You can also create a shortcut and start the game using the following: 

R:\KSP2_0.1.3\KSP2_x64.exe -single-instance -no-singlethreaded -popupwindow  -window-mode borderless -screen-height 1440 -screen-width 3440

You would need to keep the original path, and just add the options.  This is what I'm using on a 3440x1440 screen, without touching the JSON
The game filters out non-16:9 resolutions from the list of available options by default, I made a mod that disables this a while ago and it should still work on 0.1.3
This is not a bug. KSP2 currently does not natively support ultra-wide resolutions. We'll look to support these in the future, but for now you may need to resort to community solutions.
